about_the_game:
We’ve got some good looking kitties right here, boys! Get your paws on Gary Lazer Eyes to boost Kittyland’s profits, and while you’re at it, upgrade Bubbles to boost all your business Speeds. Enjoy a ton of hashcoins and liquor too!

30 Bubbles Cards to boost Bubble
Bubbles increases the speed on all Businesses. With 30 cards, you can level up Bubbles 6 times (if you have enough liquor). For every level, the speed on all Businesses doubles!

Get 1 Epic character: Gary Laser-Eyes
Gary Laser-Eyes doubles your cash for the “KittyLand” business.

Get 15 Gary Lazer Eyes Cards
If you have 15 Gary Laser-Eyes cards, you can level him up to level 3 (if you have enough liquor). You’ll get a +25% multiplier boost per level.

Get 2 Epic Trunks
Each trunk includes 6 chances to get Liquor, Cash, Character Cards (Epic, Rare, and Common), and Business Cards.

Get 2000 Liquor
With Liquor, you can renovate your Businesses and level up Characters Cards.

Get 100 Hashcoins
With Hashcoins, you can buy Liquor and Trunks to open.

(You need to reach season 3 before you can claim your rewards)

Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
